metadata.Title: CVE-2022-28654 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
is_closing_session() allows users to fill up apport.log

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2022-28654` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

apport - 2.20.11-0ubuntu71.2
apport-gtk - 2.20.11-0ubuntu71.2
apport-kde - 2.20.11-0ubuntu71.2
apport-noui - 2.20.11-0ubuntu71.2
apport-retrace - 2.20.11-0ubuntu71.2
apport-valgrind - 2.20.11-0ubuntu71.2
dh-apport - 2.20.11-0ubuntu71.2
python3-apport - 2.20.11-0ubuntu71.2
python3-problem-report - 2.20.11-0ubuntu71.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: apport package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.20.11-0ubuntu71.2').
